events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to return it and get a refund because the item doesn’t meet my expectations.
System reviewed the message content and categorized the issue as Refund based on customer keywords.
The case has been assigned to support agent Jessica Miller for processing the refund request.
Hello! I’m Jessica from customer support. I’m here to help you with the refund process for your recent order.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason for returning the item so we can assist you better?
My order number is 789456123. The product didn’t match the description, so I want to return it and get my money back.
Thank you for the details. I’ve initiated your refund request and you will receive instructions on how to return the item shortly.
Thanks for your quick assistance. I appreciate the clear instructions and look forward to completing the refund.
The refund process has been initiated and your return label has been emailed. Please follow the instructions to complete.
Just checking in to confirm you received the refund and if there’s anything else we can help you with.
We are closing your case now as the refund was successfully processed. Thank you for contacting us!
